solution_line_template: If she receives {client_requests_daily} job requests every day and works on {worked_on_daily} every day, she remains with {client_requests_daily}-{worked_on_daily} = <<{client_requests_daily}-{worked_on_daily}={remaining_daily}>>{remaining_daily} requests.
After {num_days} days, she will be remaining with {num_days}*{remaining_daily} = <<{num_days}*{remaining_daily}={total_remaining}>>{total_remaining} requests which she hasn't worked on.
